body.text: Hi {{extras.trader.trading_name}} - Unfortunately, your customers application has been cancelled.

rows.text: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} asked either the lender or Kanda to cancel their finance application. They can still apply again if this was a mistake. To apply again they'll need Howdens to send them a new credit introduction.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
